resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81588</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4412</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Developing a Visitors' Guidance System for a School or Town</string>
            <string language="es">Elaboración de un sistema de guía de visitantes a la escuela o la ciudad</string>
            <string language="ga">Córas Treorach do Chuairteoirí a Fhorbairt do Scoil nó Baile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">System Anleitung sich entwickelnden ein Besucher 
für eine Schule oder eine Stadt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un système des conseils des visiteurs se 
développants pour une école ou une ville</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um sistema da orientação dos visitantes 
tornando-se para uma escola ou uma cidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un sistema di consiglio degli ospiti di sviluppo 
per una scuola o una città</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάπτυξη ενός συστήματος καθοδήγησης των επισκεπτών 
για ένα σχολείο ή μια πόλη</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Instructions for developing an effective, easy-to-follow guidance system for a school or town which would be useful for visitors. Includes assessment criteria.</string>
            <string language="es">Instrucciones para la elaboración de un sistema de guía efectivo y fácil de seguir para la visita a una escuela o a una ciudad, que debería ser útil para los visitantes. Incluye criterios de valoración.</string>
            <string language="ga">Treoracha chun córas treorach atá éifeachtach agus éasca le leanúint a fhorbairt do scoil nó do bhaile a bheadh úsáideach do chuairteoirí. Áirítear critéir measúnaithe leis.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Technology</string>
            <string language="es">Tecnología. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Teicneolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anweisungen für das Entwickeln ein 
wirkungsvolles, einfach-zu-folgen Anleitung System für eine Schule 
oder eine Stadt, die für Besucher nützlich sein würden. 
Schließt Einschätzung Kriterien ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les instructions pour développer un pertinent, 
facile-à-suivent le système de conseils pour une école ou une ville
qui seraient utiles pour des visiteurs. Inclut des critères 
d'évaluation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As instruções para desenvolver um eficaz, 
fácil-à-seguem o sistema da orientação para uma escola ou uma 
cidade que sejam úteis para visitantes. Inclui critérios da 
avaliação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le istruzioni per sviluppare un efficace, 
facile-$$$-SEGUONO il sistema di consiglio per una scuola o una città
che sarebbero utili per gli ospiti. Include i test di verifica 
di valutazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι οδηγίες για την ανάπτυξη έναν αποτελεσματικού, 
εύκολος-$$$-ΑΚΟΛΟΥΘΟΎΝ το σύστημα καθοδήγησης για ένα σχολείο ή
μια πόλη που θα ήταν χρήσιμα για τους επισκέπτες. 
Περιλαμβάνει τα κριτήρια αξιολόγησης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
